room_title: Escape room "Cinema" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: We had four rooms filled with people and my group is the only one that escaped. The staff was very nice and treated our group of 25 very professionally. We escaped the cinema room with 18 minutes and one clue left to go. Sat outside and kept waiting on the others groups to escape. This was a fun adventure to do in Lakeland.

room_title: Escape room "Cinema" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: This was my first time visiting. My friends and I did the Cinema escape room. Although we didn't escape, we had a blast trying. The staff was extremely nice. I'll definitely be returning.

room_title: Escape room "Cinema" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: We did the Cinema room as a group of 5. What a wonderful time! The attention to detail was amazing! The staff are all well trained and very helpful. This family-owned business treats their customers with much appreciation. They developed their own rooms, clues and storylines so you will not find these rooms anywhere else! Great job Lakeland Escape Room!
